transcripts.text: This is a life-size Noah's Ark, and it is huge.  One and a half times the length of a football field, half the width of a football field, from ground level to the roof is seven stories high, to the biggest timber frame structure in the world.  Just about everyone around the earth has heard of Noah and the ark and the flood.  The fact that the Bible has this account, a man and his family built this great big wooden ship and all the land-dwelling, air-breathing animals were represented on this ship and the whole world was flooded.  That account itself just fascinates children and adults alike.  And so we decided to build a life-size Noah's Ark based upon the.
